#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ 
    int t, len;
    string s;
    cin >> t;
    while(t-- > 0)
    {
        cin >> s;
        len = s.length();
        for(int i = len/2-1;i >= 0;i--)
        { 
            cout << s[i];
        }
        for(int i = len-1;i >= len/2;i--)
        { 
            cout << s[i];
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
